thread.title: EMC spins out VMware cloud services and makes them part of Virtustream
thread.title_full: EMC spins out VMware cloud services and makes them part of Virtustream - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: EMC spins out VMware cloud services and makes them part of Virtustream
text: Enterprise software player VMware, which is partly owned by EMC — which in turn just got bought by Dell for $67 billion — today announced that its making some big changes to its cloud services. VMware’s vCloud Air public cloud portfolio is becoming part of public cloud and cloud software provider Virtustream, which VMware acquired […] »
